response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product not only serves its purpose effectively but also adds value to your daily routine. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional item, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $200. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that could easily be valued higher on the market. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this offer.", "product_price": 200}
